mapper.insert: INSERT INTO weeklyranking (author, board, likes, rankingType, weekOf) VALUES (#{author}, #{board}, #{likes}, #{rankType}, #{weekOf})
INSERT INTO weeklyranking (author, postCount, commentCount, rankingType, weekOf) VALUES (#{author}, #{postCount}, #{commentCount}, #{rankType}, #{weekOf})
mapper.select: SELECT id, author, board, likes, postCount, commentCount, rankingType, weekOf FROM weeklyranking ORDER BY id
mapper.update: UPDATE weeklyranking SET author = #{author}, board = #{board}, likes = #{likes}, postCount = #{postCount}, commentCount = #{commentCount} WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.select: SELECT p.postId AS id, u.userNickname AS author, p.title AS board, COUNT(pl.likeNo) AS likes FROM post p LEFT JOIN postLike pl ON p.postId = pl.postId JOIN user u ON p.userId = u.userId GROUP BY p.postId ORDER BY likes DESC LIMIT 10

SELECT u.userNickname AS author, COUNT(DISTINCT p.postId) AS postCount, COALESCE(SUM(CASE WHEN c.commentId IS NOT NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END), 0) AS commentCount FROM user u LEFT JOIN post p ON u.userId = p.userId LEFT JOIN comment c ON p.postId = c.postId GROUP BY u.userId ORDER BY postCount DESC, commentCount DESC LIMIT 10

SELECT u.userNickname AS author, COUNT(DISTINCT p.postId) AS postCount, COALESCE(SUM(CASE WHEN c.commentId IS NOT NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END), 0) AS commentCount FROM user u LEFT JOIN post p ON u.userId = p.userId LEFT JOIN comment c ON p.postId = c.postId GROUP BY u.userId ORDER BY postCount DESC, commentCount DESC LIMIT 3
